::Composer/Orchestra::
  
       Composer looked at the datapad.

        "=
Ya, this'll be no problemo!" He said.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~
        Orchestra ran inside the BlackFortress, unintentionally igno=
ring Dragonfly.  He saw Blacknightmare and ran up to her and kissed her.

 =
       "Ya, I'm glad to be back here, I'm a little weary of battle!" he sai=
d energetically.
